sources.title: TOMBOY BESSIE (1912)
sources.description: TOMBOY BESSIE Biograph Company, 521 ft., rel. June 3, 1912 dir. Mack Sennett, auth. William E. Wing, cam. Percy Higginson cast: Mabel Normand, Mack Sennett, Kate Toncray, William J. Butler, W. C. Robinson, Frank Opperman, Charles Gorman? filmed: 4/1912 Location: CA copyright: June 8, 1912

metadata.Plot: Bessie is certainly a terror and manages without much trouble to get into all sorts of mischief. She gets tired of playing alone and schemes to have Andrew, the suitor of her Aunt Cissie, play with her. Andrew would rebel, but the injunction that he must amuse the kid, Bessie, or get out, makes him consent. The stunts she puts him through make him worthy of the bestowal of Cissie's hand in marriage.
metadata.Actors: Mabel Normand, Mack Sennett, William J. Butler
